SEARCH
Package ygong.APS

Class Schedule.MachineWithOrders

java.lang.Object
ygong.APS.Schedule.MachineWithOrders
All Implemented Interfaces:
Iterable<Schedule.OrderWithTime>
Enclosing class:
Schedule
public static class Schedule.MachineWithOrders extends Object implements Iterable<Schedule.OrderWithTime>
Helper class for Machines

The class that takes the original Machine as a reference and have additional orders and approximate run time for the machine.

Note:
if memory size is not big issue, we can extend Machine class for memory efficiency, we use composition by reference

    • addOrder

      protected boolean addOrder(Order o)
      Add order to the machine
      Parameters:
      o - the order to be added, not checking if it is already in the machine
      Returns:
      true if the order is added successfully, false otherwise
      Note:
      This add order doesn't check if the order o is already in the machine. Implement with caution.
